app_descript:
Facebook

Brief: Facebook is an all-encompassing social media platform that not only keeps you connected with friends and family but also serves as a personal organizer for your photos and other media. It facilitates easy photo-sharing, tailored privacy, and staying up-to-date with news and events from around the world by following public figures, brands, and more.
